website_summaries.verdict: Adds a cellulite-fighting element to the cream with elastin, collagen, and ginseng.
pros: Daily application builds soft color gradually, with visible results in skin firmness in 7 days
Gives an even color that covers up blemishes
cons: Many customers had negative comments about the unpleasant odor that self tanners are prone to

customer_reviews.title: Worked after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff used it for 2 days and have seen excellent results 😁😁 I am so happy with this product and it smells AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: amazing!! I got so dark in just a week. I bought another bottle already. Definitely worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Good lotion, bad package
customer_reviews.text: Like the lotion, hate the packaging. As you can see, the blue shiny part peels off... and since you’re squeezing lotion into your hands while touching that part, it becomes an unavoidable mess.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Saw results after 1 day!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lotion. It doesn't really smell like anything, and when I bought it on a whim, I applied to (very hairy) winter legs immediately. I was tanner in 1 day then I ever get with a tanning bed. I highly recommend this product. I applied to my back and arms after exfoliating (used a lotion applicator to get my back) and there were no streaks at all. Very easy product to use. I have VERY sensitive facial skin and used this with a half and half mix on my face, and it worked so well. Would not recommend using on your face if you wear any makeup- do it at night only.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: This product made me very Nauseous!
customer_reviews.text: Very toxic!! Smells like super harsh chemicals. I have put on sun screens that aren’t as harsh. The first time I put this on it made me physically sick so I thought for sure it couldn’t have been the jergens. This morning I gave it one more try and I am super sick again with the same symptoms as the last time I used this harsh product. This product cannot be healthy for any human being and I’m not even an organic type or holistic person but dang this lotion has got to be crazy bad for you. I’m not even going to research the ingredients... it will probably make me more sick!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Not the same 3 day glow
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same as the 3 day glow. I’ve used the 3 day for years and it gives you nice natural looking color quickly. I had a hard time finding it I stores and I thought they changed the packaging. I purchased this, used it and the next day immediately knew it was not the same. I thought maybe they changed the formula but discovered it is not the same product. I found the 3 day glow by jergens on amazon and ordered a bottle. If you want great color quickly, use the 3 Day. This stuff is fine as a moisturizing lotion but it will take forever to achieve color. IMO the 3 day is the best!
customer_reviews.author: SolSmiles

customer_reviews.title: Wash hands thoroughly after use. will streak if you do not take your time
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Works very well. Leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth as well as giving I skin a very nice healthy glow. My recommendation is you wash your hands thoroughly and immediately after applying this lotion to your skin. Go slow and be patient with application to skin. You will see streaking if you do not apply this product consistently and thoroughly
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Summer must!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a favorite product of mine for years. It is a great daily moisturizer and adds a good amount of color. I’m fair and have cool skin tones and i like to use the medium/tan color. It adds a bit more color and isn’t too warm. I only put in on my knees and joints every few days but apply to the rest of the leg and body daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Even sunkissed color
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this product. I apply after a shower, using an exfoliating mit in shower, towel off and carefully moisturize thoroughly with a body lotion and follow with a generous amount of Jergens Natural glow. I get a nice even color. I did purchase an applicator to make doing a full body application possible.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Smith

customer_reviews.title: Skip the tanning bed! Use this!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this lotion for about 1 month I started off with fair to med and then went to med- Tan and I’ve had nothing but amazing results! Use this lotion everyday and you will definitely be able to stay tan and skip the tanning bed this item is 100% I’m impressed!!!
customer_reviews.author: _mommyoftwinangels_

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a gradual tanning lotion that actually works. For me personally I’m able to apply to my face without any reaction, and it immediately gives me a nice glow like I’ve been at the beach all day, but without drying up. It says up to seven days to reduce appearance of cellulite but after three days I saw a difference !
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a slow but sure thing! The process can take up to a week to see a difference but in two weeks you will most definitely tell you are a couple of shades darker!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal J.

customer_reviews.title: I'm Orange and Streaky.  Smells Awful!
customer_reviews.text: I normally love this product, I've used it for a couple of years. However, this time it smells terrible (never used to) I applied as directed, like I Always have. But I'm a funky burnt orange color and Streaky! I bought it bc the weather has been lousy and I have an event this weekend. I keep taking showers, still streaky and orange. What happened?
customer_reviews.author: José Vina

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality for the cost. The scent is much less than other products that my spouse and I have used. As a fair-skinned person, the color looks natural and the description is accurate that it improves over a day or so. It moisturizes well and I did not need to exfoliate. I did however rub in the product vigorously to avoid spots and patches. Very happy with the price and effectiveness of the product!
customer_reviews.author: Burke

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this stuff for years but this is my first time buying it from amazon. This stuff is perfect for first time fake tanners or if you fake tan but want it to last the maximum time. It does have an odor but most fake tans will. I’d say it takes about 3 days of continual use for me to start to see color. After about 4 days I like to use it every other night that way I don’t start to look orange. Love it !!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: A BEAUTIFUL GLOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I love this lotion. I have used it for years. But it seems to have improved over the years. The scent is so pleasant. I love that it takes only about 10 minutes to dry. It is my go to for firming and self tanner. A tip. Use a good exfoliating scrub first and then use a tanning mitt. It will be flawless. And there's no worry of turning orange.
customer_reviews.author: Southernmermaid85

customer_reviews.title: Nice natural looking tan and cheaper than buying it in store
customer_reviews.text: My go-to post winter lotion! I have light/medium skin tone but I'm so pasty after winter. After using it for a week it gives me a slight sun kissed look. Super natural...not at all orange. It is pretty thick but melts into skin. Also the smell has really improved (I used to buy this years ago and the fake tan smell was so strong).
customer_reviews.author: MD Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Love. Love. Love.
customer_reviews.text: A must have. Love it. Make sure to wash your hands afterwards. Kinda stained my white sheets but it comes out no problem in the wash. Be easy on the tops of your feet as well. I used to only use St. Tropez mousse but this is my new go to and it’s like $40 cheaper. I put it on daily before bedtime (most nights) and my tan in perfect by morning..
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Winston

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for appearing to be tanned...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it almost daily and my legs always looked summer-tanned without a bit of sun. I recommend making sure it's evenly applied and completely "rubbed" into the skin from toes up, not missing areas. Then be sure to wash your hands and concentrate on nail areas so that they don't discolor. Smell is non-existent. I've gotten a ton of comments like, "wow, you must tan all day." Or, "your legs looks awesome." I also use it on my arms, but not face or neck.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Easy tanning and perfect price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the nice subtle tan, and glow. Looks very natural. The price is perfect too. Doesn't leave any streaks either. I usually apply it ,let it dry and sit in skin for the day , then shower it off before bed. Like all tanners , you need to rinse off so color doesn't go on your sheets. Don't worry if it does, it washes out. Definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamersvill

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! My favorite self tanner ever!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is my Holy Grail. I love That the color is gradual. Some self tanners get super dark the first time so you can’t really mess up. This one has grace. I ALWAYS MOISTURIZE MY KNEES, ELBOWS, FEET AND HANDS BEFORE APPLYING SO THE PRODUCT WILL COME OUT EVENLY. I can see the difference overnight with this lotion but it’s subtle. By day 3-4 I’m pretty tan and from then on I just use every other day to maintain the color and the best part is ITS NOT ORANGE. LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Falisha

customer_reviews.title: The good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Don't forget your feet!! lol .... I started applying to feet to match the legs still need a few more days to match the legs but getting there... love this stuff <3
customer_reviews.author: Candiies

customer_reviews.title: Skin reaction
customer_reviews.text: Applied on clean skin on legs had a horrible itching reaction. Had to wash off immediately. Strange this has never happened before with other products. Refunded money without having to return product.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly
customer_reviews.text: This brand has the best scent and works quickly. I have tried the cheaper ones which actually work but they smell bad. Jergens brand smells fresh and there is not streaking what so ever. The product does what it claims to do and the tan lasts long. I am already tan easy and I have an Olive skin tone however in the winter I like to keep the tan look so I use it year round. As for firming I exercise so that's how I stay firm! So I cannot speak to that claim.
customer_reviews.author: bert walker

customer_reviews.title: Works well with regular use!
customer_reviews.text: I love jergens products, great value and they are hard to mess up! I have used the light to medium and medium to tan lotions as well as the in-shower moisturizer. The medium to tan isn't as dark as I had hoped but I am hoping with more use it will darken. Be sure you are using this at least 3x a week for best results and rinse your hands and in between your fingers after applying!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Fake Fake Fake Orange Stain
customer_reviews.text: Fake Orange Stain - totally disgusting. If you have a light skin tone the fake stain effect is even more apparent. No one, outside of a pumpkin has a skin tone anywhere close to this. This product also has a stink somewhat worse than insect repellant. It does NOT apply evenly. I strongly dislike this product - strongly recommend you find another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: It works. I'm happy with Amazon's delivery the next day. I have an upcoming vacation so I needed this. the product does what it says it's going to do but I wouldn't use this every day because it will start to turn you a little bit Orange.
customer_reviews.author: CBell

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware: Received Old or Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and usually buy from drug store. After one application (and yes I exfoliated prior) my skin became a blotchy mess. After screwing off the cap I noticed the opening to the tube was larger than my drug store Jergens. I suspect this is a fake or old product!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Symons

customer_reviews.title: Gradual and Subtle but Great!
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a self Tanner before and this is perfect for the beginner. No streaks or stains. It is very gradual though. So if you want a quick noticeable change, you may need the darker shade. I am planning on ordering the darker one now. I used it for two weeks before my wedding every day. It was noticeable after about a week but it was very subtle. I have a Capri tan on my legs and it didn't even out before the wedding but it did look better. Anyway, it smells great and does definitely work.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Barger

customer_reviews.title: great color for sunless tan
customer_reviews.text: Really like this brand and actually my dermatologist recommends it as well. It is not orange and you have control of the color depending on how often you apply. Been using this product for years.
customer_reviews.author: edlynnetx

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price, I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I am not a self tanner so I wanted something natural, and this is perfect. It goes on like a regular lotion and doesn’t streak if you take time to rub it in well. It doesn’t smell bad either... at first. After a few hours, it starts to smell like every other self tanning product on the market. I don’t mind it too much, but you should be aware if that smell really bothers you. It does smell like self tanner after a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Hester P.

customer_reviews.title: Great self tanner
customer_reviews.text: This is the only self tanner I will use. I'm generally in a hurry, and I've never had a problem with streakiness with this Jergens tanner. It imparts color gradually, so it's easy enough to stop when you're satisfied. Once I've reached that point, instead of applying daily, I'll use it a couple of times a week. I really like that it doesn't have a strong chemical smell to it. Another plus is that I've never had a problem with it discoloring my clothing or, if used at night, my sheets. Overall, I think this is a great self tanner.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: first time
customer_reviews.text: it was my first self tanning experience and it was super easy! I put it on right before bed. love that its just like lotion and that you don't have to wash it off. I also love that it gets darker after every use
customer_reviews.author: Krystal deleo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect natural color, but doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered twice. I LOVE the natural tan shade. I only wish it would last longer one the color develops! Drastically fades after 2, MAYBE 3 showers. Doesn’t do a thing for my thigh cellulite. Great surface moisturizer. I really love the color! Most natural-looking self-tanner I have ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An affordable tanning product that works.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Jergens Natural Glow and Firming lotion for years. I am fair skinned but always get medium to dark. The firming results are noticeable if I stop applying. This does not smell awful although it does have a scent. I use another scented lotion every other day to keep my skin hydrated between applications. I highly recommend fir an affordable option to tanning.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: Really works and immediate results
customer_reviews.text: I bought the medium to dark one even though I’m super white. It really does add a beautiful bronze to your skin not orange looking and I saw dramatic results after just 2 uses. It smells wonderful and isn’t greasy at all. I have white sheets and no transfer of color. Really love this !
customer_reviews.author: DeviantCat

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting Tan
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this lotion for ten years. Its unbelievable! When getting ready for an important meeting or event I put it on the night before. I wake up tanned and confident. I love the natural glow it provides- never orange like most self tanners. It also extends the life of my natural tan better than any other lotion. I cant say enough great things about this lotion!You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Derber

customer_reviews.title: Great self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite self tanner. It looks natural and doesn’t smell horrid like most do. It is not that moisturizing. I use something a little heavier for that because I have older skin. I recommend this for anyone who wants a nice glow and no orange streaks.
customer_reviews.author: danna

customer_reviews.title: Gradual Glow
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this product for years, and the gradual glow it’s just what we need to keep the Orangeness away. It’s still has a slight self tanner sent and if not applied properly you can make mistakes, such as streaking. For the price and quality it is great when used correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great fake tan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought it a week before going to the beach for vacation and didn’t want to be the palest person there. I was slightly weary of fake tan as I have heard horror stories (too orange, streaky, etc.) but was so so so happy with the end results. My tan developed within and hour after applying, and gave me a great natural glow. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: FanTANstic
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works!!!!! I've never looks so tan, and naturally tan, not orange. Initially it smells good. After a few hours, I started to feel like I smelled like popcorn. My husband told me I was crazy, he didnt smell it. But results really are good!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: The best self tanner! ;)
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite self tanner! Affordable, moisturizing, smells great, and my skin likes it. I am light skinned and this gives me a little color in the summer. Rub it in well and let it dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Thicker consistency, great color, not that moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for about a year now. I really like that the color develops in just a few hours and that it doesn't leave streaks. My only complaint is that it really isn't that moisturizing. You'll have to alternate betweent this and regular moisturizer if your skin is moderately dry. The smell is pleasant and light.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Fast and safe tanning alternative!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite tanning option! It makes your skin smell so good and is very soft. Such a safer way to tan, and also has quicker results! I would say to make sure that you let the lotion set for at least 5 to 7 minutes before getting dressed, or the tan will get a little splotchy.
customer_reviews.author: Tana

customer_reviews.title: Working already
customer_reviews.text: Used twice so far and already noticing a difference. It smells good but once you wake up it smells like a tanning bed. That's the only negative.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: best self-tanner!!
customer_reviews.text: The thing I love the most about the Jergens brand self-tanner is you can see a difference right away. With this lotion, a lot goes a long way and you can see a change in your skin tone immediately. This is by far the best tanning lotion I've used. It doesn't wash off or fade quickly - it really does stay on. The lotion smells good too! My only complaint is it does tend to stain my hands a bit after application, even though I immediately wash them afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt stink!
customer_reviews.text: I am very fair and wanted a little color and this definitely dows the trick. It is easy to apply, doesnt seem to streak, and that best thing is it does not stink!!! I used it once and can see color already but again i am very fair. I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my pale skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Works very well for my extremely pale skin and the color is awesome! It smells so good going on however, once it starts developing it smells like most self tanners. Not terrible but not my favorite either haha. I like to put it on at night and rinse off in the morning! Overall 10/10 on my second bottle and even ordered the face specific one!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Can even out tan lines on naturally tan skin
customer_reviews.text: I have olive/tan skin naturally and I use this stuff to even out my tan lines. I will use it on one particular part of my body that gets less sun exposure, like my chest. For the neighboring skin, I’ll apply lotion and then just drag the tanner very slightly onto it. After 1-2 days of application, the artificially tanned areas blend in great with my natural skin tone. I do this weekly and have not noticed any negative effects of the tanner.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Torres

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTH
customer_reviews.text: The smell was so nice and it doesn’t look fake at all!! I’m naturally a light color, so I’ve been using the fair to medium for the past three months. Great base color. Not that it’s summer and I’ve gotten darker, I just used the medium to dark for the first time yesterday. Hopefully I see a difference
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years! I am very fair skinned and love the medium to tan shade. I use medium to tan instead of fair to medium because this way I got some color pay off with just one application! The lighter shade takes at least 2-3 times use. Very hydrating and good scent.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Self Tanner Lotions on the Market
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my lotion routine and saw amazing results within a couple of hours! While you need to be sure to completely rub this product in and wash your hands afterward, this is an amazing self-tanner that pairs super well with their face lotion!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Kramer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works! The change happens subtlety which is nice especially for people like me who are trying this for the first time. I’ve been using it for a few days now, less than a week. I like the results and hope to see a change in firmness over the next few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: a nice product which easy to apply - it goes on smoothly And isnt too greasy in time it gives even light tan effect, and with out this I'm very pale! just wash all areas if your hands as soon as you've applied this - and be easy on the knees
customer_reviews.author: A Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price of the product, the smell, and how well it moisturizes. It tans very nicely if you want a minimal, gradual tan. I didn't want anything too sudden or dark, so this worked great for me. It does get a little patchy if you do not apply evenly though. If you apply to your legs, make sure to not put pants on until it dries. DON'T apply to elbows or knees excessively, because it will become unnecessarily darker than the rest of your skin. You do not need to wear gloves, just wash your hands after applying. For how cheap it is, it works great for my skin and is a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were bigger 😂 if you’re doing your whole body you will run out quick. Will update in a couple weeks! Smells sooo good. I used this brand self tanner like 6 years ago but a different formula, and that smelled like pancake syrup. The smell of this is light and sweet!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Scala

customer_reviews.title: Love this self-tanner
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of different tanners and this one works great and is easy to use as its also a moisturizing lotion so I get both jobs done at one time. The color is natural and never streaky. It is my go-to.
customer_reviews.author: RunnerGurl

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but typical self tanner smell :/
customer_reviews.text: For someone like me who doesn’t self tan, I found this to be easy to use and it gives a great result. You can definitely tell the difference after one application but it is gradual. My only complaint is the smell, it says it doesn’t have any tanning odor but it does and i think it’s pretty strong. I’m not used to self tanning so if you are, this might be more subtle than others.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sampedro

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly natural sunless tanner
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have been using it for years. It lasts and lasts and even works well when put away for the winter months. Safer than the sun and waves a natural tan skin color. Not yellow or streaky.. Highly recommend it. Now using both the face tanner separately with no fears of skin cancers from the sun!
customer_reviews.author: MEM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome self tanner
customer_reviews.text: This product takes several applications to build up to a “tan” appearance. The smell is great, especially compared to other self tanning lotions. It’s great value and very moisturizing. The color is natural looking ( not orange ) on my fair skin. I’ve purchased this several times and will continue to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: KSW

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: I love how this works but the smell is very strong. My partner noticed the smell right away and asked why I smelled like that (not good reaction). I will continue to use for the color but I wish they could dull the smell down.
customer_reviews.author: Mcb546

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is very thick and moisturizes thoroughly, and it really does seem to firm the skin, as well. Used daily, it will keep a sun-kissed look going. I use it on my legs and feet. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: P. McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent subtle glow - NO STREAKS! 👌☀️
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t make you orange! I mix with Aveeno body lotion, about 50/50 each, and evenly rub the mixture into my skin. I’ve never been orange or streaky when I mix with another body lotion before applying. I’ve been using this brand for about 15 years and have always had great results.
customer_reviews.author: woop woop

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this stuff. Alas, it made my skin orange and streaky. I did all the things you're supposed to do: exfoliated, dried off thoroughly, applied evenly and not too thickly, waited 20 minutes-1/2 hour to get dressed, and so on. I had patches of orange and streaks on my legs, not a good look. I'll pass.
customer_reviews.author: Gbobmi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Sunless Tanner
customer_reviews.text: Whoa, this is by far the best sunless tanner I have used. It smells great, has great color and is easy to apply. I have used really expensive designer brands that smell so awful. I’m never using anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Really nice color
customer_reviews.text: This product has really great color. It goes on easily and as long as you make sure that you cover yourself carefully and completely it gives you and nice even color. One of the things that you should be aware of is that it starts to peel up after so many application on top of each other. You really need to exfoliated in between applications so there is not build up. The color is true with no orange and it is easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: seasonedbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tan, nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. It’s a nice lotion. smells nice, not chemical and leaves the skin soft and smooth. Color develops over a few hours. I usually apply before bed after my shower and wake up with a nice warm glow. Using it a few days in a row develops a darker shade, then once or twice a week to maintain. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: nancy bryant

customer_reviews.title: My favorite.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion. Moisturizes while adding a little tan. Didn’t want to get out in this craziness just for lotion but Amazon usually has anything I need. Great deal made it a little cheaper than in the store. Came in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Better smelling than most!!
customer_reviews.text: It seems that Jergens has really worked on the scent of their products, because self-tanners (actually, by Jergens or by anyone), are typically so bad-smelling, but this is very nice, fresh, and enjoyable. And, it still gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: BBRITT

customer_reviews.title: Best lotion to give yourself a natural looking tan at home!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff ! I am pale by nature and I buy the medium to dark and it gives me a great, natural looking tan! It is not streaky, it is very moisturizing and it dries quickly. It smells great. I cannot say enough great things about it!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t even able to give this product enough of a chance to see if it worked because the smell was HORRIBLE. I smelled like I had bathed in my grandmother’s perfume. It actually made me nauseous. And I’m used to some pretty bad fake tan smells as I fake tan every 1-2 weeks. I had to shower twice after putting it on and I could still smell it. To be honest I’d rather just smell the DHA tanner smell than the fragrance they used to try to cover it. Not worth the headache and nausea.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F

customer_reviews.title: Year round user!! LOVE THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every other day, after I shower. I brush off the dead skin, and always have a nice tan without the harmful effects of the sun. I live in AZ, obviously I am not out in 105° heat!! It just puts a nice glow to my body. I use it all year round. Just for a healthy looking bronze.
customer_reviews.author: JANIN

customer_reviews.title: smells amazing, i would recommend it to anyone looking to get a subtle but noticeable tan!
customer_reviews.text: I used this stuff years ago and i loved it and decided to give it a go again, and its just like i remember, possibly a little more potent with the tan, because i didnt rub it in super even on my legs and you could see the difference in where i didnt rub it in... woops, or maybe im just more pale now (probably that lol) only thing i can say bad is i ordered medium to dark and got light to medium- turned out to be a good thing because im pale af and it probably would look redic lol
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: My sister has been using this after since I gave her my like 10 year old bottle that never used because I always forget to moisturizer and wow! It worked! So now, I bought myself one to get my tan on before the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Melisa

customer_reviews.title: Great if you don’t want to commit to a full on self tanner!
customer_reviews.text: I remember using this years ago and the smell being SO strong and unpleasant. I’m glad I gave it another shot because they really fixed the smell and it’s so much better!! It definitely will change scent on your skin as you wear it throughout the day but that’s expected. This stuff is great! It’s fool proof and great if you don’t want to commit to a full on self tanner.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I’ve used a lot of “great value” self tanners and this one really really works. One use and I was already a couple of shades darker. Be careful to apply well to avoid streaks, but I haven’t seen any yet! The only complaint I have is that if you sleep with it on it smells like DHA in the morning but even that is really really light compared to every other tanner I’ve used. I haven’t seen a change in my cellulite but my legs are SO soft!! Highly recommend, especially if you want an overnight glow!!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Weeg

customer_reviews.title: Best body tanning lotion for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Gives you natural brown hue without being orangey. The scent is decent, my skin is moisturized and drying time is quick. I mix this product with nivea skin firming gel to improve the overall appearance of my thighs and tummy. I’m happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winter season Sun tan
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice deal for the dollar. The lotion last a long time and subtlety suntanned by body without streaks or smells. It won't clog pores but my skin did feel a bit dry. I alternate between days with regular lotion. Color stays on great.
customer_reviews.author: Divina

customer_reviews.title: A healthy not fake color to rid pallid and makes you look younger no bags or tired look
customer_reviews.text: I beg all to try this. I have pallid from illness. This makes me look younger and gives me nice ral not fake nor orange com or..used 15 years..It is my first need of all make up...cover bags parlor....and lines..fine ones...you look naturally healthy
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Marie

customer_reviews.title: Sorry. Can't be the OG
customer_reviews.text: Remember when it used to smell awful? Remember when it was just a little too streaky? NOT ANYMORE. They have perfected the formula. Why pay $50 when this does the job better and doesn't make you smell like a hospital?
customer_reviews.author: Darius Kohanim

customer_reviews.title: The best product to get natural tan!
customer_reviews.text: My slime is pretty pale but I took the colour “medium to tan” and didn’t regret about that because it looks so natural on me and it has building effect and day by a day after using this lotion I get tanner😍 I’m obsessed with this product! That already my second bottle. Ant this product washed out very gentle, you just stop using this and getting lighter without leopard dots and I never looks orangiey always looks natural on me. I can recomend to everybody!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anzhelika

customer_reviews.title: Didn't tan
customer_reviews.text: A this just didn't do it for me. Didn't tan me at all even though I was consistent and followed the directions, though it's pretty self-explanatory. Real bummer :/
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: I must be allergic to it ! I’m just itchy all the time my face and neck have a lot of little bumps or pimples I don’t know . Took too long to get color and it washes away every time you bathe!
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure this should be classified as a self tanner (which is how I found it in google search)! I have applied for over a week now and haven’t noticed a change in my color. I bought the medium to tan. On a positive note.....it smells good and moisturizes well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Literally so mad there is so many good reviews but it just didn’t work at all. I even got medium to tan, and nothing I followed all the steps and I have applied almost everyday and I look the exact same as before. The only color that did show up is spotchy and streaky. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful wonderful stuff
customer_reviews.text: After exfoliating my body in shower. I used this cream using a mitt all over except my face. Did this two nights prior to going to a wedding. Wow was shocked how tan ( nice color not orange) It gave me. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A.

customer_reviews.title: Fake tan
customer_reviews.text: It’s oky, I smell like fake tan and it is splotchy
customer_reviews.author: kellsie

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product for years. It’s really good! The color is really nice and natural looking and it builds with daily use. Make sure to exfoliate regularly and wash your hands after applying so as not to stain your fingernails.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan & Khadijah Shabazz

customer_reviews.title: Natural color
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for years, it makes me look like I have actually been in the sun. I was allergic to some of the self tanners but haven't had any problem with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Northriver

customer_reviews.title: Nice product little faults
customer_reviews.text: I liked it It definitely gave me color. I probably should have got the lighter shade. (I got med to dark) I feel like I did turn a little orange. I washed my hands after applying and my hands are clearly a different color then the rest of my body
customer_reviews.author: Kate Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! It makes me nicely tanned but not unnaturally dark, no streaks or patches
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Lima

customer_reviews.title: Old faithful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several self tanners and while this lotion doesn’t show up immediately, it’s definitely the easiest to apply and doesn’t streak or smudge like other self tanners. I’ll be sticking to this product from now on!
customer_reviews.author: LJH

customer_reviews.title: Much improved over the years
customer_reviews.text: Much better scent and color than in the past. I had given up on sunless tanners years ago but a friend convinced me to give it a try. I am glad I did. The new formula is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ponsor

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I am a regular indoor & outdoor tanner. I've tried every brand of sunless tanning lotion out there. They either stink, turn you orange or stain your clothes really bad. I was convinced they all did that....... until I tried this! I use the fair to medium in the winter & the medium to tan in the spring & summer months. This stuff smells good, the color of the tan looks natural and it does not stain my clothes. After I put it on, I do let it dry for about 15 minutes or so. I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Heather R

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Tanning Lotion
customer_reviews.text: I won’t go a summer day without this stuff. Smells much nicer and moisturizes more than other self tanning lotions.
customer_reviews.author: Bry Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I tanned for 20 years and was recently diagnosed with melanoma, so I have to stay out of the sun and tanning beds, which is EXTREMELY hard for me. This lotion adds just enough tint to look natural, no orange and no streaks. I wish I would have found this years ago to save my skin from cancer, wrinkles and sun spots.
customer_reviews.author: Rick H.

customer_reviews.title: Great skin care products
customer_reviews.text: Picture 1 is the face product. Picture 2 has the body one. Picture 3 has all the Jergens I've used. The white looking one i bought in 2012 from a local store and I LOVED THE SMELL. These other ones don't have the good smell. But I still love the smell to all of them. Thank you Jergens for wonderful products.
customer_reviews.author: Milllie

customer_reviews.title: Works well giving subtle color.
customer_reviews.text: Works well giving subtle color. Looks natural on my olive skin tone. Slight odor in warm climate (Florida). But I have been loyal to for price point & effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Tina  Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Really moisturizes and gives you that sun kissed look
customer_reviews.text: Moisturized my skin, has a wonderful scent which I love and gave my skin a glowy look. Made my skin look like it was out in the sun and had a warm glow. Didn't turn my skin Orange, spread easily, and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’m pale but I’m not ghostly so I figured I could be medium so I ordered the darker one, big mistake I am in fact fair and not medium 😂 so I ordered the fair one and I am going to try it out. The medium to tan one developed very well and was a good tan color just looked unnatural on me especially since I didn’t work up to it!
customer_reviews.author: Laney Williams

product_meta.title: Jergens Natural Glow + Firming Daily Moisturizer Medium to Tan Skin Tones 7.5oz
product_meta.description: Color:Medium to TanApplying your daily body lotion can achieve a flawless, natural-looking glow and help reduce the appearance of cellulite. Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Daily Moisturizer for Body gradually delivers subtle, streak-free color and reduces the appearance of cellulite in as little as 7 days. To enhance your natural skin tone, apply in place of your regular body moisturizer at least once daily and you'll have beautiful, natural-looking color in about one week. Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Daily Moisturizer for Body improves the look of cellulite. It is inflused with a blend of collagen, elastin and polymers and spreads over skin to give it a smoother look. The moisturizer also contains a blend of hydrating ingredients and antioxidants. Your skin stays nourished while getting its glow on without the unpleasant sunless tanning odor - just a light, fresh scent.
feature_bullets: FLAWLESS SELF TANNING: Create a flawless tan for gradual, natural looking color before, or after, the beach
GRADUAL TANNING LOTION: Our Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING moisturizer will gradually enhance and deepen your natural skin tone to provide hassle free, streak free color
COMBINED VISIBLE CELLULITE REDUCTION : With collagen, elastin, and green tea infusions, our fast acting formula will help reduce cellulite appearance within 7 days
ACHIEVE HEALTHY LOOKING SKIN: With antioxidants and Coconut Water, Jergens +FIRMING Moisturizer hydrating blend of nutrients boosts moisturization for healthier looking skin and daily skin hydration
FRESH SCENTED SUNLESS TANNING: Jergens Natural Glow self tanning daily moisturizers will keep you feeling fresh with a light and fresh scent
Natural Glow Firming Medium Tanning Lotion by Jergens for Unisex 7.5 ounce Lotion
Natural Glow Firming Medium Tanning Lotion by Jergens for Unisex
